verses.verse: A Prayer <WH8605> of the afflicted, <WH6041> when <WH3588> he is overwhelmed, <WH5848> and poureth out <WH8210> his complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068> Hear <WH8085> my prayer, <WH8605> O LORD, <WH3068> and let my cry <WH7775> come <WH935> unto <WH413> thee.

Hide <WH5641> not <WH408> thy face <WH6440> from <WH4480> me in the day <WH3117> when I am in trouble; <WH6862> incline <WH5186> thine ear <WH241> unto <WH413> me: in the day <WH3117> when I call <WH7121> answer <WH6030> me speedily. <WH4116>
For <WH3588> my days <WH3117> are consumed <WH3615> like smoke, <WH6227> and my bones <WH6106> are burned <WH2787> as <WH3644> a hearth. <WH4168>
My heart <WH3820> is smitten, <WH5221> and withered <WH3001> like grass; <WH6212> so <WH3588> that I forget <WH7911> to eat <WH4480> <WH398> my bread. <WH3899>
By reason of the voice <WH4480> <WH6963> of my groaning <WH585> my bones <WH6106> cleave <WH1692> to my skin. <WH1320>
I am like <WH1819> a pelican <WH6893> of the wilderness: <WH4057> I am <WH1961> like an owl <WH3563> of the desert. <WH2723>
I watch, <WH8245> and am <WH1961> as a sparrow <WH6833> alone <WH909> upon <WH5921> the house top. <WH1406>
Mine enemies <WH341> reproach <WH2778> me all <WH3605> the day; <WH3117> and they that are mad <WH1984> against me are sworn <WH7650> against me.
For <WH3588> I have eaten <WH398> ashes <WH665> like bread, <WH3899> and mingled <WH4537> my drink <WH8249> with weeping, <WH1065>
Because <WH4480> <WH6440> of thine indignation <WH2195> and thy wrath: <WH7110> for <WH3588> thou hast lifted me up, <WH5375> and cast me down. <WH7993>
My days <WH3117> are like a shadow <WH6738> that declineth; <WH5186> and I <WH589> am withered <WH3001> like grass. <WH6212>
But thou, <WH859> O LORD, <WH3068> shalt endure <WH3427> forever; <WH5769> and thy remembrance <WH2143> unto all generations. <WH1755> <WH1755>
Thou <WH859> shalt arise, <WH6965> and have mercy upon <WH7355> Zion: <WH6726> for <WH3588> the time <WH6256> to favor <WH2603> her, yea, <WH3588> the set time, <WH4150> is come. <WH935>
For <WH3588> thy servants <WH5650> take pleasure in <WH7521> <WH853> her stones, <WH68> and favor <WH2603> the dust <WH6083> thereof.
So the heathen <WH1471> shall fear <WH3372> <WH853> the name <WH8034> of the LORD, <WH3068> and all <WH3605> the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> <WH853> thy glory. <WH3519>
When <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> shall build up <WH1129> Zion, <WH6726> he shall appear <WH7200> in his glory. <WH3519>
He will regard <WH6437> <WH413> the prayer <WH8605> of the destitute, <WH6199> and not <WH3808> despise <WH959> <WH853> their prayer. <WH8605>
This <WH2063> shall be written <WH3789> for the generation <WH1755> to come: <WH314> and the people <WH5971> which shall be created <WH1254> shall praise <WH1984> the LORD. <WH3050>
For <WH3588> he hath looked down <WH8259> from the height <WH4480> <WH4791> of his sanctuary; <WH6944> from heaven <WH4480> <WH8064> did the LORD <WH3068> behold <WH5027> <WH413> the earth; <WH776>
To hear <WH8085> the groaning <WH603> of the prisoner; <WH615> to loose <WH6605> those that are appointed <WH1121> to death; <WH8546>
To declare <WH5608> the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> in Zion, <WH6726> and his praise <WH8416> in Jerusalem; <WH3389>
When the people <WH5971> are gathered <WH6908> together, <WH3162> and the kingdoms, <WH4467> to serve <WH5647> <WH853> the LORD. <WH3068>
He weakened <WH6031> my strength <WH3581> in the way; <WH1870> he shortened <WH7114> my days. <WH3117>
I said, <WH559> O my God, <WH410> take <WH5927> me not <WH408> away in the midst <WH2677> of my days: <WH3117> thy years <WH8141> are throughout all generations. <WH1755> <WH1755>
Of old <WH6440> hast thou laid the foundation <WH3245> of the earth: <WH776> and the heavens <WH8064> are the work <WH4639> of thy hands. <WH3027>

They <WH1992> shall perish, <WH6> but thou <WH859> shalt endure: <WH5975> yea, all <WH3605> of them shall wax old <WH1086> like a garment; <WH899> as a vesture <WH3830> shalt thou change <WH2498> them, and they shall be changed: <WH2498>
But thou <WH859> art the same, <WH1931> and thy years <WH8141> shall have no <WH3808> end. <WH8552>
The children <WH1121> of thy servants <WH5650> shall continue, <WH7931> and their seed <WH2233> shall be established <WH3559> before <WH6440> thee.
